description: The opposition leader, still recovering in Germany after his poisoning, says the case is fabricated.
title: Alexei Navalny: Russian officials bring new fraud charges
title_page: Alexei Navalny: Russian officials bring new fraud charges - BBC News
maintext: Analysts say the charges are likely to be seen as a sign that the Russian authorities do not want Mr Navalny to return to Russia, though their official position is that he is free to return.
